publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5345 Ms Maureen Watt: Climate Change and Planning—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce legislation to allow councillors to take into account global warming and climate change issues when deliberating on planning applications. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5345 Climate Change and Planning (lodged on 18 December 2006) Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-5345 Ms Maureen Watt: Climate Change and Planning—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce legislation to allow councillors to take into account global warming and climate change issues when deliberating on planning applications. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Eleanor Scott, Mr John Swinney, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Alex Neil*, Nora Radcliffe*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-5345 Climate Change and Planning (lodged on 18 December 2006) Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*, Frances Curran*, Robin Harper*
S2M-5345 Climate Change and Planning (lodged on 18 December 2006) Dr Jean Turner* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J

S2M-5345 Ms Maureen Watt: Climate Change and Planning—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to introduce legislation to allow councillors to take into account global warming and climate change issues when deliberating on planning applications. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Eleanor Scott, Mr John Swinney, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Alex Neil, Nora Radcliffe, Rosie Kane, Chris Ballance, Shiona Baird, Frances Curran, Robin Harper, Dr Jean Turner
